duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage, coach, and develop Store HR/Safety Compliance Specialist within assigned districts.
Ensure compliance with HR policies, procedures, and federal/state laws.
Provide functional HR expertise and lead key projects.
Supervise, mentor, and develop Store Human Resource/Safety Compliance Specialist.
Participate in recruitment processes and talent acquisition strategies.
Design and implement training programs for team members and operations.
Write and conduct performance reviews and assist with disciplinary actions.
Review open investigations and provide resolution to employee relations issues.
Develop and maintain affirmative action program; file EEO-1 annually.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
